Package org.settings4j.util

Class Summary
ELConnectorWrapper This Wrapper makes the Getter-Methods of Connectors simply accessible by Expressionlanguages like JSP 2.0, Velocity or Freemarker.
ExpressionLanguageUtil A Simple Variable Resolver for ExpressionLanguage.
MatchPatternTransformer This Transformer implements the function for a LazyMap with Key=String (=RegEx) and Value=Boolean (=Result).
